mapper.select:
SELECT id as id, order_id as orderId, order_no as orderNo, withdraw_type as withdrawType, withdraw_reason as withdrawReason, user_id as userId, withdraw_time as withdrawTime, ext1 as ext1, ext2 as ext2, ext3 as ext3, ext4 as ext4, ext5 as ext5 FROM fm_withdraw_order
and id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE fm_withdraw_order
order_id = #{orderId},
order_no = #{orderNo},
withdraw_reason = #{withdrawReason},
user_id = #{userId},
withdraw_time = #{withdrawTime},
ext1 = #{ext1},
ext2 = #{ext2},
ext3 = #{ext3},
ext4 = #{ext4},
ext5 = #{ext5},
and id = #{id}
